success.title: Note Created Successfully!
success.subtitle: Your secure note is ready to share. The link will self-destruct after being read.

security.title: Important Security Notice
security.warning1: This link can only be used once - after being opened, it will be permanently deleted
security.warning2: Share this link only through secure channels (encrypted messaging, telegram)
security.warning3: Never share this link in public places or unsecured channels
security.warning4: The note will automatically expire if not opened within the specified time

destroy.description: Changed your mind? Destroy this note immediately to prevent anyone from reading it.
destroy.confirm: Are you sure you want to destroy this note? This action cannot be undone.

telegram.title: Telegram Notifications Enabled
telegram.subtitle: Stay updated when your note is read
telegram.description: Click the button below to link this note to your Telegram account. You'll receive an instant notification when someone reads your note!
telegram.step2: Telegram will open automatically. Press START or send /start
telegram.step3: That's it! The bot will link this note to your account. You'll get notified when someone reads it.
telegram.privacy: Privacy first: Only you will receive notifications. Your Telegram account stays private.
telegram.emergency: Security: If someone enters a wrong password or tries to re-activate a note you've already linked, you'll receive an instant alert and you can remotely DELETE the note.
